professional.name: Tommy Joe Awe
professional.biography: I provide year round guide service on the Salmon River. I am always keen to share my love of whitewater rafting. I am here to work hard and help you have best experience of a lifetime. I am a graduate of Sweet Water Guide School out of Big Timber Montana.

professional.name: Dina Medio
professional.biography:
I provide year round guide service on the Salmon River. I am always keen to share my love of whitewater rafting. I am here to work hard and help you have best experience of a lifetime. I am a graduate of Sweet Water Guide School out of Big Timber Montana.
      When not busy on the river I am an online ESL teacher and an inspiration to children.  I am a bit newer to the team and am great for beginner and intermediate rafting adventures. I am looking forward to sharing my knowledge and tips with fellow anglers.

professional.name: Eda Brown
professional.biography: I am an experienced guide who will work hard for you, with a patience of a saint. Whether a seasoned veteran or just a beginner for whitewater rafting, give me a call and letâ€™s go for kayaking.
